DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare whether oocyte flush retrieval effective .
DOC.brief_title: Single Lumen Needle Without Flushing Double Lumen Needle With Follicle Flushing Oocyte Retrieval
DOC.detailed_description: In total 300 patient randomized effectiveness single double lumen needle oocyte retrieval . Double lumen needle give opportunity wash follicle flush . Single lumen needle seem fast need flush . We aim compare difference use needle .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo IVF/ICSI cycle . Poor responder patient low 6 follicle hCG administration day . Patients 30 follicle .
